word: \93I repeated to myself again and again, \91If that is true, I can never be a Christian. I can never hope to be like those children,\92 and was driven by this thought to discouragement and almost to despair. But when I learned that I could come to Jesus just as I was, that the Saviour had come to ransom just such unworthy sinners, then light broke upon my darkness, and I could claim the promises of God.
